response.answer_text: Mummy - Most beautiful woman  — took care of me without any complaints and without any expectations of any kind of rewards... (Still takes care of me)  Pappa - Most handsome man  — ignored his needs , just because of my needs without any expectations of any kind of return gifts... (Still ignores his needs)  Ex-GF - Most cutest girl  — taught me , how to become a mature person and how to treat a girl with respect  Friends - Most ugliest (monkey face) people — taught me , how to live a life and how to motivate yourself to achieve goals and how to achieve your goals  Beauty lies in kindness,Beauty lies in honesty…Blend them together,Become a beautiful faculty…. Beauty lies in love,Beauty lies in grin…Rapped them together,Become a beautiful being… Beauty lies in care,Beauty lies in your expressions…Brew them together,Become a beautiful person… — Sumita Datta  P.S. : I'm just kidding , my friends are the most good looking people in the world Enjoy😉
